src:
Molde-treneren om Rosenborgs kunstgressutspill: – Virkeligheten i Norge er ikke slik
02 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Trond Hustad
Erling Moe avfeier at det kan bli naturgress på Aker stadion i nærmeste framtid
Debatten rundt kunstgress raser videre i Fotball-Norge. Rosenborg vil ha bort kunstgress fra alle baner i norsk toppfotball. I en fersk NISO-undersøkelse svarer 85 prosent av spillerne at de vil ha naturgress.
text:
Molde coach on Rosenborg's artificial turf game: - The reality in Norway is not so
02 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Trond Hustad
Erling Moe announces that there may be natural grass at Aker Stadium in the near future
The debate about artificial turf continues in Football Norway. Rosenborg wants to remove artificial turf from all courses in top Norwegian football. In a recent NISO survey, 85 percent of players say they want natural grass.
